title: Top Age-Based Video Play Insights App
executive_summary: This Business Requirements Document outlines the creation of a mobile application that offers users insights into the most played video at every age, providing a unique perspective on video content consumption across different demographics. The app aims to fill the gap in the market by leveraging data analytics to provide curated content recommendations based on age-specific interests, thereby enhancing user engagement and satisfaction. Through this initiative, we aim to capture a significant share of the digital content market by offering a novel service that appeals to users' curiosity and personal preferences.
business_context: The digital content consumption landscape is rapidly evolving, with users increasingly seeking personalized and meaningful content. Current market offerings focus on general trends and popularity metrics, often overlooking the nuanced preferences of different age groups. This gap presents a unique opportunity to launch an innovative mobile application that tailors video recommendations based on the most played videos across various age demographics. By addressing this untapped need, the app stands to carve a niche in the competitive content discovery and recommendation market, offering insights that can enhance marketing strategies, content creation, and user engagement.
problem_statement: There is a lack of personalized content discovery tools that cater to the specific interests of users based on their age, leading to a gap in the market for a service that can provide age-specific video content insights.

objectives.description: Develop and launch a mobile app that provides users with the top played video content for every age group, thereby enhancing personalized content discovery.
success_criteria: Achieve 100,000 downloads within the first six months
objectives.business_value: Fills a market gap by providing age-specific content insights, increasing user engagement and opening new marketing avenues.

in_scope: Development of mobile app for iOS and Android
Data analytics for identifying top played videos by age
User interface design focused on ease of use

constraints: Dependency on third-party data providers for video metrics
assumptions: Users are looking for more personalized content recommendations
Access to reliable data on video play metrics is available

risks.description: Potential inaccuracies in age-related video play data leading to irrelevant recommendations
risks.mitigation: Implement robust data validation and user feedback mechanisms

stakeholders.name: Project Manager
stakeholders.role: Oversees the project to ensure objectives are met on time and within budget.

success_metrics: Metric 1: Achieve 100,000 downloads within the first six months
Metric 2: Maintain a user engagement rate of 60% or higher

milestones.name: App Development and Testing
deliverables: Beta version of the app for internal testing
